pr_title: Parallelize load definition within a worker

timeline.message: parallelize load definition within a worker

timeline.bodyText: Will this be a problem if list.size is smaller than numLists + 1?
timeline.author: calvinjia

replies.bodyText:
divide happens before + 1 so it's guaranteed to be at least 1 (as long as numLists is > 0).
But more importantly, new ArrayList<>(0) is fine because it's just initial capacity.
replies.author: bradyoo

timeline.bodyText: Should the replication options be removed?
timeline.author: calvinjia

timeline.bodyText: nit: I would remove the empty line 57. We try to keep the src code concise and compact
timeline.author: apc999
